thread.title: Bahamas set to welcome World Travel Awards Caribbean & North America Gala Ceremony 2015

title: Bahamas set to welcome World Travel Awards Caribbean & North America Gala Ceremony 2015
text:
Bahamas set to welcome World Travel Awards Caribbean & North America Gala Ceremony 2015 
Great Exuma, Bahamas, 15th October 2015 
World Travel Awards has landed in the Bahamas ahead of the Caribbean & North America Gala Ceremony 2015 . 
The ceremony is scheduled for this Saturday, October 17th, with hundreds of industry leaders expected to attend the event at Sandals Emerald Bay . 
Final preparations are now underway at the resort, with hosts Andrew Kennedy and Anastagia Pierre set to star. 
Entertainment on the night will be provided by Bahamian cultural institution The Crusaders Junkanoo Group, while a time honoured performance from The Royal Bahamas Police Force Pop Band will also wow guests. 
World Travel Awards President Graham Cooke said: “Sandals Resorts International has long been a key partner for World Travel Awards and it is a pleasure to return here to be among friends at Sandals Emeralds Bay. 
“With just a few days to go until the event we are presently adding the finishing touches to the Gala Ceremony and I look forward to welcoming all of our guests on Saturday night.”
